title: Ticket #4464: Setting GLOBUS_THREAD_MODEL causes GSI failures
description:
When Globus is told to be thread-safe, it loads a library with routines for the appropriate threading library. See parent ticket #4440 for details on why this can fail. This problem can affect all Condor binaries if GLOBUS_THREAD_MODEL is set in the environment.

Whenever we're activating Globus modules, we should first explicitly set the Globus thread model we want. At the moment, we want "none". In the future, if we want a different threading model, we can imply the fix from #4440 for the library loading problem.
